void T9PredictiveInputBox::OnLayoutClient (   )  [protected, virtual]
 

Is called, if the client area should be layouted (e. g. when the control is initialized or the size of the client area has changed). The use of the class Layouter for layouting the controls is recommended.

See also:
Layouter

Reimplemented from Control.

BOOLEAN T9PredictiveInputBox::OnLongKeyPress (  KeyCode  key_code  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Is called once before the autorepeat starts, if a key is pressed for a long time.

Parameters:
Code of the key.

BOOLEAN T9PredictiveInputBox::RouteMessage (  const Message &  msg  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Implements the message routing of controls. It is recommended not to change the default message routing and usually it should not be necessary.

See also:
Dispatcher::RouteMessage
